name: Adventure Quest for the Grail
description:
Adventure Quest for the Grail is an action adventure game based on the original "Adventure"

An evil magician has stolen the Enchanted Chalice and has hid it somewhere in the kingdom. You must retrieve the Chalice and put it back into its rightful place in the golden castle. But beware as the evil magician has created five dragons, Yorgle, the yellow dragon who is mean, Grundle, the green dragon who is mean and ferocious, Smeug, the black dragon who mean and ferocious and devious, Nerbort, the white dragon who mean and ferocious and devious and deceitful, and Rhindle, the red dragon who is the deadliest.
